participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.background: I like to use my creativity to make unique and interesting items from thrift shop finds. I start my senior year of high school next week. I think it's really cool to be able to build things with your own hands. I want to be a doctor when I graduate. I'm learning a lot about myself through my studies and my experiences in the water.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.background: My social media life is pretty low-key, because I'm more focused on my studies. I live alone with my dog. I enjoy playing soccer. I like tailgate parties. I have a loving family and we love animals.

content.text: Hi, how's your day going so far?
It's going pretty good so far, thanks for asking. I'm just getting ready to go to work. What about you?
My day is going well, thank you. I'm just getting ready for school. I start my senior year next week.
Oh wow, good luck with that! I know how stressful senior year can be, but it's also really exciting.
Thanks! I'm looking forward to it. I'm also looking forward to starting my college applications. I think I want to be a doctor when I graduate.
That's great! I'm sure you'd make a great doctor.
Thanks! I think I'd be good at it too. I'm really interested in the human body and I love helping people.
That's really great. I'm sure you'll be a great doctor.
No problem! What else do you like to do?
I like to play soccer and go to tailgate parties. I also like to spend time with my family and friends.
That sounds like a lot of fun. I like to play soccer too. I also like to go to the beach and hang out with my friends.
That sounds like a lot of fun too. I've never been to the beach, but I'd love to go sometime.
